p: According to the literature, celery seed contains approximately 2% of volatile oil [ 9]. Previous literature studies do not show this method of treatment in the case of hydrodistillation of essential oil from celery seeds. However, ultrasound-assisted extraction is a valuable green and novel technique applied in essential oil hydrodistillation [ 7]. It has been found that ultrasonic hydrodistillation or maceration significantly affected the increase of the efficiency of essential oil from thyme leaves ( Thymus vulgaris L.) (about 9%), carrot seeds ( Daucus carota L.) (about 33%), peppermint leaves ( Mentha piperita L.) (about 10%), and marjoram herb ( Origanum majorana L.) (about 12%) [ 2, 10, 11].
